name: SaileeBollywoodTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open bollywood trivia”
”answer is four”
”repeat the question”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bollywood trivia
des: Bollywood trivia is for allIndian movie enthusiasts. Bollywood trivia is played in many Indian families on game nights and parties. Being updated on Bollywood is fun and thanks to Alexa we can play the trivia anytime with friends, with more questions added periodically to challenge you!
